comment.text: The SignOnEndpointUrl translation key is used to display the URL for Single Sign-On endpoint configuration, typically found in portal settings or integration settings. This value appears as a placeholder text when setting up an Identity Provider (IdP) integration, prompting users to enter their actual SSO endpoint URL.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'مزوِّد' (mazawwid) is often used for provider, but in this context, 'جهة' (jiha) or a more direct translation might be more appropriate for 'Identity Provider'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: عنوان رابط نقطة نهاية تسجيل الدخول الموحد لجهة الهوية.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the phrasing 'نقطة نهاية تسجيل الدخول الموحد لـ' feels a little clunky. It could be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: عنوان رابط نقطة نهاية تسجيل الدخول الموحد لهوية.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'IdP Birdəfəlik Giriş nöqtəsi URL' is not the most accurate or natural-sounding translation for 'IdP Single Sign-On Endpoint URL'. While 'Birdəfəlik Giriş' translates to 'Single Sign-On,' the phrasing is slightly awkward. 'Nöqtəsi' (point) is a bit literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP Tək Giriş URL

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly wrong, using a space between 'IdP' and 'Tək Giriş URL' in the suggested correction would improve readability, as is common in Azerbaijani.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP Tək Giriş URL

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "URL адрес на крайна точка за единично влизане на доставчика на самоличност" is a bit verbose and literal. A more natural and concise translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL за единично влизане (IdP)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes "URL адрес".  It's more common to simply use "URL" in Bulgarian, especially in technical contexts. Including both is redundant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove "адрес" and use just "URL"

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Adresa URL koncového bodu jednotného přihlášení IdP' is a very literal and somewhat clunky translation.  'IdP' is an abbreviation that might not be widely understood by all Czech users. A more natural and understandable translation would better convey the meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Možnosti: 'URL adresa pro jednotné přihlášení (IdP)' or 'Adresa URL pro přihlášení přes IdP'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation uses a space before punctuation which can be perceived as inconsistent with common Czech style guides.  Although not incorrect, consistency is preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the space before the colon. 'Adresa URL koncového bodu jednotného přihlášení IdP:'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL des Single Sign-On Endpunkts vom IdP' is not the most natural or precise translation of 'IdP Single Sign-On Endpoint URL'. 'vom IdP' implies ownership, which isn't accurate.  It should be more accurately represented as belonging to the IdP.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL des Single Sign-On Endpunkts des IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses German terminology ("IdP", "Endpunkts") instead of Greek. It doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'IdP Single Sign-On Endpoint URL' in Greek.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more appropriate Greek translation would be something like: "Διεύθυνση URL σημείου εισόδου ενιαίας διαχείρισης ταυτότητας (IdP)" or "URL σημείου εισόδου ενιαίας σύνδεσης (IdP)" depending on the desired level of formality.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of German words in a Greek translation creates a formatting inconsistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace German terms with appropriate Greek equivalents.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL del punto de conexión de inicio de sesión único IdP' is overly literal and a bit awkward in Spanish. While technically correct, a more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL de inicio de sesión único IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation retains the abbreviation 'IdP'. While common in technical contexts, it may not be immediately understandable to all Spanish-speaking users. A more user-friendly version might consider adding an explanation or using a more descriptive term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL de inicio de sesión único del proveedor de identidad (IdP)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'IdP yksittäisen sisäänkirjautumisen päätepiste URL' is overly literal and not idiomatic Finnish. 'yksittäisen sisäänkirjautumisen' is a cumbersome way to say 'Single Sign-On'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP sisäänkirjautumispäätepisteen URL

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes a space between 'päätepisteen' and 'URL'. It's more common to omit the space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP sisäänkirjautumispäätepisteenURL

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "URL du point d’accès à l’authentification unique IdP" is a bit verbose and could be more concise. 'Point d'accès' is a literal translation of 'Endpoint' but might not be the most natural phrasing in French for a technical context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL du point de connexion unique IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes a space before 'IdP', which might not be consistent with other instances of 'IdP' in the software.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL du point de connexion unique IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "IdP Միակ մուտքագրման վերջնական կետ URL" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "IdP Single Sign-On Endpoint URL". While understandable, it's a bit literal and clunky. "Միակ մուտքագրման" (single entry) is correct, but could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more concise and idiomatic translation like "IdP Անվճար մուտքի վայրի URL" or "IdP Միասնական մուտքի վայրի URL".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation includes "URL" at the end. While technically correct, it might be stylistically preferable to avoid repetition if 'URL' is already understood in the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing 'URL' if the context already implies it.  Alternatively, explore Armenian equivalents for 'URL' if they exist and are commonly used.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "URL dell’endpoint Single Sign-On IdP" is technically correct but not the most natural or idiomatic Italian. "IdP" is often kept as is, but the phrasing could be improved for clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL dell’endpoint Single Sign-On (IdP)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The abbreviation 'IdP' might benefit from parentheses for better readability, especially if the target audience isn't familiar with the abbreviation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL dell’endpoint Single Sign-On (IdP)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'IdP Single Sign-On URL ຈຸດສິ້ນສຸດ' is a literal translation but doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Endpoint URL'.  'ຈຸດສິ້ນສຸດ' translates to 'endpoint' but doesn't convey the URL aspect. A more accurate translation would incorporate the concept of a web address.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP Single Sign-On URL ທີ່ປາຍທາງ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the spacing between 'URL' and 'ຈຸດສິ້ນສຸດ' could be improved for readability. A space is needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP Single Sign-On URL ຈຸດສິ້ນສຸດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'IdP vienotās pierakstīšanās galapunkta vietrādis URL' is not the most natural or precise translation of 'IdP Single Sign-On Endpoint URL'. 'Vietrādis' implies a 'location' or 'address' which isn't quite accurate in this context. It's more about the endpoint itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP vienotās pierakstīšanās galapunkts URL

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, maintaining capitalization consistency with English is often preferred for technical terms. 'URL' is capitalized in English and should be capitalized in Latvian for consistency.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP vienotās pierakstīšanās galapunkts URL

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'IdP Single Sign-On Eindpunt URL' is a direct transliteration of the English, but 'Eindpunt' could be improved. A more natural Dutch phrasing would be 'Inlogpunt' or 'Authenticatie-eindpunt'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP Single Sign-On Inlogpunt URL

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'IdP' is often left untranslated in technical Polish contexts, or translated as 'IdP'. Translating it as 'pojedynczego logowania IdP' is unusual and might be confusing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Adres URL punktu końcowego pojedynczego logowania IdP (IdP)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'IdP URL do Ponto Final do Início de Sessão Único' is overly literal and clunky. 'Ponto Final do Início de Sessão Único' is a complex way to say 'Single Sign-On Endpoint'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP URL do Endpoint de Acesso Único

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the Portuguese translation uses a long and complex phrasing. A more concise and natural translation would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP URL do Endpoint de Acesso Único

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL do ponto final de logon único IdP' is a literal translation and sounds awkward in Portuguese. 'Logon único' should be 'Single Sign-On' or 'autenticação única'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL do ponto final de Single Sign-On (SSO) IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Acronyms like 'SSO' are often included in parentheses after the full term for clarity, especially for a more technical audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL do ponto final de Single Sign-On (SSO) IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "URL punct final de autentificare unică al furnizorului de identitate (IdP)" is overly literal and somewhat awkward in Romanian. While technically correct, it's not the most natural phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing such as "URL-ul punctului final de autentificare unică (SSO) al furnizorului de identitate (IdP)" or "URL-ul punctului final SSO al furnizorului de identitate (IdP)".  Replacing 'autentificare unică' with the abbreviation 'SSO' makes it more concise and common in Romanian technical contexts.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and could be improved for better flow in Russian. 'IdP Single Sign-On Endpoint URL' is quite technical, and the direct translation can sound clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like 'URL единого входа IdP' or 'Адрес единого входа IdP'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon at the end of the translation might be unnecessary or stylistically awkward depending on the context where this key is used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Evaluate whether the colon is needed based on surrounding text. If not, remove it.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'IdP තනි පිවිසුම් අන්තයේ ඒ.ස.නි.' is not an accurate translation of 'IdP Single Sign-On Endpoint URL'. 'ඒ.ස.නි.' translates to 'A.S.N.' which is an abbreviation and doesn't clearly convey the meaning of 'URL'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP තනි පිවිසුම් URL

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically the words are spelled correctly based on Sinhala orthography, the combination 'තනි පිවිසුම් අන්තයේ' is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තනි පිවිසුම් ස්ථානයේ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'URL' isn't directly translated. While understandable, including a Sinhala equivalent or explanation might improve comprehension for a wider audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP තනි පිවිසුම් ස්ථානය (URL)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL koncového bodu jednotného prihlásenia IdP' is overly literal and less natural-sounding in Slovak. While technically correct, it can be improved for better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL jednotného prihlásenia IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is missing a space after 'URL' and before 'jednotného'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL jednotného prihlásenia IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'končna točka URL enkratne prijave' is not the most natural or accurate rendering of 'IdP Single Sign-On Endpoint URL'. 'Enkratne prijave' literally translates to 'single login', but a more idiomatic translation would involve conveying the concept of 'Single Sign-On'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: IdP URL končne točke za enotno prijavo

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'IdP URL končne točke za enotno prijavo' would be more readable if the order of elements were changed to improve flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL končne točke za enotno prijavo IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "URL крајње тачке за једнострану пријаву на страни Идентитетског пружаоца" is overly literal and verbose. "SignOnEndpointUrl" specifically refers to the endpoint used for Single Sign-On (SSO). The term 'страни Идентитетског пружаоца' is not the most natural way to convey 'IdP'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL крајње тачке за једнократну пријаву (SSO) добављача идентитета

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'једнострану пријаву' should be 'једнократну пријаву' to accurately reflect the English 'Single Sign-On'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: једнократну пријаву

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian term "добављача идентитета" is a valid translation for "IdP", but it's long and potentially confusing for users.  A more concise and commonly used alternative exists.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Идентитетског провајдера

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "URL krajnje tačke za jednostranu prijavu na strani Identitetskog pružaoca" is overly literal and verbose. A more natural and concise translation would improve readability. "URL za jednokratnu prijavu (SSO) Identitetskog pružaoca" or "URL za jednokratnu prijavu Identitetskog pružaoca" would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL za jednokratnu prijavu (SSO) Identitetskog pružaoca

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "jednostranu prijavu" is slightly awkward in Serbian.  Using "jednokratnu prijavu" (single sign-on) is more idiomatic and commonly understood.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: jednokratnu prijavu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "URL-адреса кінцевої точки єдиного входу постачальника посвідчень" is overly literal and a bit clunky in Ukrainian. While technically correct, it lacks natural flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Розгляньте альтернативні варіанти, наприклад: "URL-адреса входу через єдиний логін (IdP)" або "URL-адреса точки входу для єдиного входу постачальника ідентифікації".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "єдиного входу постачальника посвідчень" could be shortened for better readability.  Consider removing 'постачальника' or 'ідентифікації' depending on context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Simplify the phrase, potentially using just "єдиного входу" or "єдиного входу (IdP)".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL điểm cuối đăng nhập một lần IdP' is a literal translation and sounds awkward in Vietnamese. 'Điểm cuối' is technically correct, but 'địa chỉ' (address) would be more natural for 'Endpoint' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL đăng nhập một lần của IdP

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the order of 'một lần' (once) sounds slightly less fluent. It's more natural to place it closer to 'đăng nhập'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL đăng nhập một lần của IdP
